name: Cavemen Tales Collector's Edition
description:
A long ago, in a land before time, there was a forest. For as long as you can remember, a tribe of humans lived safely there. But then, everything changed! For mother nature is unpredictable sometimes….



Will you help Sam and Crystal and their family to find a new place to live for the entire tribe?
In this fun and colorful time-management game you will explore, guide the tribe, build, gather resources, overcome obstacles along the way and enjoy the tale of family, friendship and courage!

However, be aware not everyone really has honest intentions. There are people who only strive to power and wealth. There are some who think the tribe should obey their orders, no matter what the orders are.



This COLLECTOR'S EDITION version contains some special features:
- Bonus levels with extended story-line
- Additional achievements
- Art Gallery
- Soundtrack



  • Help Sam and Crystal and their family to find a new home
  • Explore the prehistoric era and meet peculiar characters
  • Stop the bad guys from ruining tribe's happiness
  • Dozens of exciting levels to master and hundreds of quests
  • Find hidden treasures and win achievements
  • 3 difficulty modes: relaxed, timed and extreme
  • Step-by-step tutorials for beginners
